datasets.name: data.csv
datasets.description: Related to historic buildings, architectural marvels, and ancient construction techniques.

columns.name: ceremonial_use
columns.description: Indicates if the structure was used for ceremonial purposes

columns.name: climate_harshness_score
columns.description: A numerical representation of the harshness of the climate where the structure is located, with higher values indicating more severe weather conditions

columns.name: structural_complexity
columns.description: A numerical score representing the complexity of the building's architecture.

columns.name: shape_index
columns.description: Metric combining the width and height of the structure to assess its shape, calculated as height divided by width plus width divided by height.

columns.name: preventive_measures
columns.description: Indicates if routine preventive measures against erosion and material degradation are applied

columns.name: structure_age
columns.description: Age of the structure in years

columns.name: height_meters
columns.description: Height of the structure in meters

columns.name: modern_infrastructure
columns.description: Indicates whether the building is equipped with modern infrastructure such as electricity and plumbing.

columns.name: neighbor_inscription_percentage
columns.description: Percentage of nearby ancient structures that have foundational inscriptions.

columns.name: site_location_region
columns.description: The geographical region the site is located in, like 'Tropical', 'Temperate', or 'Arid'

columns.name: building_material_reflectivity
columns.description: Measure of how much sunlight the building's primary exterior materials can reflect

columns.name: reliance_on_natural_lighting
columns.description: Whether the building design primarily relies on natural lighting for illumination and temperature regulation

columns.name: has_stone_foundation
columns.description: Indicates whether the building has a stone foundation or not

columns.name: restoration_presence
columns.description: Binary indicator of whether the nearby area has ongoing or recent restoration efforts.

columns.name: construction_year
columns.description: Year the structure was constructed

columns.name: average_wall_thickness
columns.description: Average thickness of the walls measured in centimeters

columns.name: facade_complexity_index
columns.description: Score representing the complexity of geometric patterns and ornamental design on the structure's facade

columns.name: daily_visitor_count
columns.description: Average number of visitors per day

columns.name: distance_to_nearest_village_km
columns.description: Distance in kilometers to the nearest village

columns.name: has_foundational_inscription
columns.description: Indicates whether the structure has historical inscriptions on its foundation.

columns.name: local_construction_materials
columns.description: The primary material used in the building's construction, categorized by local availability.

columns.name: durability_material_percentage
columns.description: Percentage of nearby ancient structures that utilize highly durable construction materials.

columns.name: material_origin
columns.description: Indicates if the building materials were locally sourced

columns.name: urban_shadowing
columns.description: Binary indicator if the building is in an urban area with significant shadowing by other tall buildings

columns.name: opening_area_percentage
columns.description: Percentage of total wall area devoted to windows and other openings

columns.name: structure_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for each structure

columns.name: ratio_of_clear_to_cloudy_days
columns.description: The ratio of clear days to cloudy days annually at the building's location

columns.name: average_tourist_visits_per_year
columns.description: Average number of tourists visiting the structure per year

columns.name: in_historical_conservation_area
columns.description: Whether the structure is within a legally protected historical conservation area

queries.question: Can you determine if the distance to the nearest village for structures in the dataset is influenced by a combination of their age, climate harshness score, and whether they are located within a historical conservation area?
queries.true_hypothesis: The distance to the nearest village is influenced by the age of the structure, the harshness of the climate where it is located, and whether it is within a legally protected historical conservation area. The distance is calculated based on specific conditions related to the structure's age, climate harshness score, and its location regarding historical conservation areas. Structures with older age and higher climate harshness scores may be closer to villages, and being located within a historical conservation area could also affect the distance to the nearest village due to the associated factors considered in the calculation.
